alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 2:27PM CDT until August 03 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central St. Charles County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Warren County in east central Missouri... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Truesdale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wentzville, Warrenton, Wright City, Truesdale, Innsbrook, New Melle, Treloar, Foristell and Holstein. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 193 and 203. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
